Judul: PROJECT MANAGEMENT IMPLEMENTATION TOWARDS BUSINESS IMPROVEMENT IN THE DRILL-BLAST PROCESS OF SURFACE MINE OPERATION
Abstrak: The project management concept is used as the platform of the solutions, since it provides most of the core infrastructures such as: work breakdown structure templates, resource management, execution management, and post mortem review to help in improving short-term production plan development, resource allocation, constraints validation, task distributions, and effective communication among stakeholders; these also supported by the establishment of planning standard manual and management system. Technology also takes significant roles to help effective implementation of solutions, using Microsoft Project Server, .Net Framework, and Mobile Task Management System. The implementation plan is through a project sponsored by Management and involving across area of functions: Drill-Blast, MIS, and Business Improvement Department.
Kata Kunci: integrated, planning, execution, project management, mining, Grasberg
